items.name: 16.04 Haze Outdoors
items.desc:
6.4% ABV // 1.080 OG // 70 EBC // 20 IBU // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), OATS (GLUTEN), Hops, Yeast
HAZE AND SOME OF THE MONK TEAM RECENTLY TOOK A TRIP TO THE COAST, HEADING TO HIS FAVOURITE SEA-LOCKED KNOLL UNDER THE CLIFFS NEAR WHITBY.
We went fishing, foraged for firewood, and Haze showed off his impressive outdoor culinary skills as the sun set over the sea. This backdrop inspired the fourth beer in the Haze Outdoors Patrons Project series, with conversation drifting to Haze’s memories as a kid growing up in Whitby, and his favourite treat made by local family bakery, Botham’s - Yorkshire Brack cake. This beer has been created to replicate the flavours of this Yorkshire delicacy.
We decided to keep things pretty simple and brew a classic English porter with a grist designed to replicate the sticky, dried fruit and earthy spice character of this Yorkshire fruit cake. Starting with a base of deep golden spring barley malt, we focused on layering up plenty of crystal malts for copious dark cherry, toffee and currant notes including Belgian Special B, a light crystal from Castleford’s Fawcett malt, and a touch of Crisp Malt’s dark crystal. Seeking deep colour and silky-smooth flavours whilst keeping roast levels low, we included chocolate malt and Weyermann Carafa Spezial, and bulked the grist out with plenty of flaked oats.

items.name: 23.02 Homebrew Heroes
items.summary: Shepherd's Warning // Chris Morley // English Red IPA
items.desc:
6.3% ABV // 1.064 OG // 30 EBC // 15 IBU // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), WHEAT (GLUTEN), Hops, Yeast
A DISCUSSION AMONG FRIENDS ABOUT HOW GOOD RED IPAS ARE WAS THE INITIAL SPARK OF INSPIRATION FOR THE HOMEBREW ITERATION OF THIS BEER.
This, coupled with a quick scroll through a well- known homebrew website in search of potential ingredients, led to the question “I wonder how a Red IPA with all British hops would taste?”. The final recipe took a surprisingly traditional twist...
The resulting beer features three different degrees of caramel malt. Carared sits alongside light and dark crystal malts to give the beer a deep ruby hue, and a rich sweet caramel flavour. The addition of wheat and Munich malts to the grain bill then contribute to produce a full-bodied beer which is rounded out with British hops. To begin, Admiral is added into the boil, before the surprisingly fruity varieties of Olicana, Jester and the experimental CF182 (also known as Opus) are added into the whirlpool and dry hop. These provide complementing citrus flavours that pair well with the caramel base created by the malts.

items.name: 26.02 Sarah Harris
items.summary: Culinary Adventures: Scarborough // Double Cone Ice Cream Pale
items.desc:
8.2% ABV // 1.090 OG // 10 EBC // 20 IBU // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), OATS (GLUTEN), LACTOSE (MILK), Strawberry, Hops, Chocolate, Vanilla, Yeast
As we enter summer, our patrons series tour with Sarah Harris takes us to the Scarborough coast. The sun is in the sky, the fish and chips were fresh and salty and all that is left is to complete the perfect day is to head down to the beach, picking up a double cone ice cream (with flake) on the way! This double ice cream pale is designed to replicate that taste of the seaside in delicious beer form. We built the beer up over a base of silky flaked oats and mouthfeel-building chit malt as part of an extra pale malt grist. To bring out the creaminess we craved, we combined lactose milk sugar and Madagascan vanilla to bring out the most classic of ice cream flavours. For our second scoop, we went with 100g/l of strawberry puree during fermentation and finished off with the all-important flake, with a late addition of milk chocolate.

items.name: Death
items.desc:
12% ABV // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: Water, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), OATS (GLUTEN), Dextrose, Hops, Yeast
Our annual release imperial stout returns. Double-mashed for strength and an extra concentration of flavour, we use a fine-tuned mix of chocolate and brown roasted malts, dark crystals and plenty of silky flaked oats, all backed up with a whirlpool addition of Mosaic hops. No adjuncts, no adulterations, just a classic combination of dark chocolate, coffee and toasted roast character paired with hedgerow fruits and sticky toffee notes from the crystal malts.

items.name: Don't Mess With Yorkshire Ale
items.desc:
ABV |4.5%| 440ml
This week we're bringing back Don't Mess With Yorkshire! In truth, we missed it. We missed the beer and we missed having a can called Don't Mess With Yorkshire. We've had quite a few requests to re-brew this beer so you may already be familiar, if not, this is a fantastic sessionable pale ale at 4.5% which has been heavily dry hopped with Amarillo, Falconers Flight and Mosaic, with Ekuanot at flame out!
You must be over the age of 18 to purchase this product.

items.name: Enter The Haze
items.desc:
The humble IPA has been on an incredible journey. With it’s origins in England the style quickly took over the world. Initial American attempts to re-create this classic British style with big, bold US hops led the first West Coast IPA’s, over the last decade we’ve seen the style evolve again. Here we combine higher dry hopping with a water profile and yeast that gives stone and tropical fruit flavor and a hazier appearance to the beer. This is one of our favourite styles of beer and we’re proud to have championed it over the years.
Cases contain:
4 x FAITH
4 X STRIDING EDGE
4 X HEATHEN
All for £32!

items.name: Eternal
items.desc:
ABV: 4.1% ABV // 11.00 EBC // 45 IBU // 1.05 OG // 330ML
INGREDIENTS: WATER, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), HOPS, YEAST
A product brewed for almost 7,000 years, a quest for perfection that never ends. Citrusy, light and refreshing. To Eternity.
SUITABLE FOR VEGANS

items.name: Faith
items.desc:
ABV: 5.4% ABV // 6.00 EBC // 30 IBU // 1.04 OG // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: WATER, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), WHEAT (GLUTEN) OATS (GLUTEN), HOPS, YEAST
A Hazy Pale Ale packed with soft fruit flavours. Smooth, tropical and juicy. You’ve got to have Faith.
SUITABLE FOR VEGANS

items.name: Faith In The Summer
items.desc:
5.4% ABV // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: Water, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), WHEAT (GLUTEN), OATS (GLUTEN), Hops, Yeast
The first in a seasonal variation on Faith, were we play with different yeasts and seasonal hops and turn everything up a few notches. This summer, we’ve brought in an English ale strain which leaves an extra residual sweetness and enhanced ripe tropical fruit esters which really enhance the double dry hop charge of Citra and Mosaic hops resulting in a smooth, juicy pale ale loaded with mango and lemon zest flavours.

items.name: Great Northern Lager
items.desc:
ABV: 4.3% ABV // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: Water, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), WHEAT (GLUTEN), Hops, Yeast

items.name: Heathen
items.desc:
ABV: 7.2% ABV // 11.00 EBC // 30 IBU // 1.04 OG // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: WATER, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), WHEAT, OATS (GLUTEN), HOPS, YEAST
A bold yet balanced New England IPA. Soft, resinous and tropical. For the Heathens.
SUITABLE FOR VEGANS

items.name: Keep The Faith
items.desc:
Every Keep The Faith 12 pack sold includes a £3 donation for our For The North Foundation grant fund. The Foundation looks to offer £5000 grants to support vital community projects and causes in the North. Every 3 months, we advocate a different social cause. Currently, we are championing awareness of the LGBTQ+ community in the North, and this grant fund will go towards supporting projects and organisations that help this community.
ABV: 5.4% ABV // 6.00 EBC // 30 IBU // 1.04 OG // 330ML
INGREDIENTS: WATER, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), WHEAT (GLUTEN) OATS (GLUTEN), HOPS, YEAST
A Hazy Pale Ale packed with soft fruit flavours. Smooth, tropical and juicy. You’ve got to have Faith.
SUITABLE FOR VEGANS

items.name: New World IPA
items.desc:
ABV: 6.2% ABV // 14.00 EBC // 60 IBU // 1.06 OG // 330ML
INGREDIENTS: WATER, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), HOPS, YEAST
The first hops from the new world arrived on UK shores in the 1800’s. Packed with a new world of flavour. Citrus, zest and pine. This is our tribute.
SUITABLE FOR VEGANS

items.name: Northern Heroes
items.desc:
These are go-to’s. If you were stranded on a desert Island and could only choose three beers. These would be ours. You open a pub and are only allowed three beers on draft. These are the ones. You’re having the ultimate barbecue, you open the lid of your cooler to find three beers amongst the ice… You get the idea.
Each case contains:
4 x FAITH 330ml
4 X ETERNAL 330ml
4 X NEW WORLD 330ml
All for £25.50!

items.name: Ofs006
items.desc:
4.3% ABV // 1.048 OG // 9 EBC // 15 IBU // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: Water, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), Malted WHEAT (GLUTEN), OATS (GLUTEN), Strawberry, Orange, Red Grape, Mint, Cucumber, Orange Peel, Lemon Peel, Hops, Yeast
We wanted to recreate the experience of sitting in the sun, drinking that world-renowned English summer punch, made to the classic spec. A complex mix of adjuncts take centre stage: strawberry, red grape, mint, orange, cucumber, orange peel and lemon peel. To create a beer as similar to its inspiration as possible, we used Vic Secret to bring a gentle strawberry note in the kettle, and added a whole load of different fruits and peels to bring flavour, with a gentle sourness letting the rest of the ingredients sing.

items.name: Ofs009
items.desc:
4.7% ABV // 1.048 OG // 5 EBC // 15 IBU // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: WATER, MALTED BARLEY, MALTED WHEAT, OATS, RICE, HOPS, YEAST
The first lager in the OFS Projects series. This super crisp, clean rice lager was brewed with high portions of flaked rice, and hopped with US varieties El Dorado and Amarillo. This is an easy-drinking light lager, with subtle tangerine and Seville orange flavours, complemented by the pineapple and fresh floral notes provided by the hops.
----
In 2014 we opened the doors to the Old Flax Store, a Grade II listed building that we found and renovated into the home of Northern Monk.
We grew significantly in the years to follow, but the Old Flax Store remains the heart of the operation. If you’ve ever visited us here, you’ll know that you can look through the ground floor window to see our original tanks still in operation. This is where we brew our smaller, more limited releases.
2020 marks the year that we launch a brand-new beer series, a series dedicated to the exploratory, small-batch nature of brewing at OFS. We’ve released beers exclusive to the Old Flax Store before, but we’ve given this series a whole new identity.
The Old Flax Store Special series will push the boundaries of our brewing, allowing us to be completely experimental in approach. Since these beers will be limited in quantity, we’ve restricted can sales to two per person, to ensure that as many people as possible have the opportunity to try them.
We don’t expect these beers to hang around for long, so be quick if a release catches your eye. Follow our social media channels to make sure that you don’t miss out on a launch.

items.name: Origin
items.desc:
ABV: 5.7% ABV // 11.00 EBC // 45 IBU // 1.05 OG // 330ML
INGREDIENTS: WATER, MALTED BARLEY, HOPS, YEAST
(A GLUTED FREE PRODUCT)
A homage to the origins of IPA and the evolution of this style. Piney, juicy and crisp, Gluten-free and Vegan. The evolution of tradition.
SUITABLE FOR VEGANS

items.name: Pastore
items.desc:
4.5% ABV // 440ML
A mixed fermentation Berliner Weisse style beer, fermented with Hornindal Kveik and Lactobacillus, conditioned on 160 g/l mango puree. Fresh pulpy ripe mango, acidic, light, dry and juicy.

items.name: Polly's Brew Co
items.desc:
4% ABV // 440ML
After the phenomenal feedback to their dry- hopped sour, Strange Addiction, Polly’s figured “Why not brew a dry-hopped Berliner Weisse?”, and immediately threw it into their brew plans. The result is Slow Burn - a Polly’s twist on the classic style, dry hopped with 15kg of Comet and Ekuanot. Crisp, clean, and subtly tart, with juicy hop notes to boot; pure sunshine trapped in a can.

items.name: Polly’S Brew
items.desc:
6.4% ABV // 440ML
A massive hop bill of Cascade, Ekuanot, Enigma and Mosaic glides around the palate like dancers at a rollerdisco, with heaps of tropical notes from Galaxy and Mosaic, backed up with a touch of complexity from Ekuanot, and some old school bite from Cascade. Wrapped up in a big warm hug of LA3 for maximum suspension and body, Polly’s welcome back Rock the Bit.

items.name: Striding Edge Hazy Light IPA
items.desc:
ABV 2.8% // 6.00 EBC // 40 IBU // 1.037 OG // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: WATER, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), OATS (GLUTEN), HOPS, YEAST
A Light IPA inspired by one of the North’s highest peaks. Piney, citrusy and fresh. For the believers.
SUITABLE FOR VEGANS

items.name: Track Brewing
items.desc:
4.8% ABV // 440ML
A zippy little number popping with je ne sais quoi which inspires joi de vivre in all who step up to partake. You'll be handsomely rewarded with lashings of key lime, lemon curd and custard apple from the Amarillo, Meridian and Mosaic dry hop. The finish is bold and fruity, leaving you wanting more.
